availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, tinner. Native of Ireland. Married to Ann Harrington Corcoran in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 28, 1863. Father of Mary Corcoran. Tinner in Louisville, Kentucky. Partner with John Gargan in Gargan John & Co. in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 116A.

"Martin Corcoran (1836-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial 206793822, accessed July 13, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/206793822.
